mapper.select: SELECT sg.study_idx AS studyIdx, sg.study_leader_idx AS studyLeaderIdx, sg.study_title AS studyTitle, sg.description_title AS descriptionTitle, sg.likes_count AS likesCount, sg.report_count AS reportCount, sg.description AS description, sg.category AS category, sg.study_online AS studyOnline, sg.meeting_time AS meetingTime, sg.latitude AS latitude, sg.longitude AS longitude, sg.age AS age, sg.capacity AS capacity, sg.gender AS gender, sg.start_date AS startDate, sg.end_date AS endDate, sg.image AS image, sg.status AS status, sg.created_at AS createdAt, u.name AS leaderName FROM Studies sg JOIN Users u ON sg.study_leader_idx = u.user_idx WHERE sg.status = 'RECRUITING' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 9

SELECT sg.study_idx AS studyIdx, sg.study_leader_idx AS studyLeaderIdx, sg.study_title AS studyTitle, sg.description_title AS descriptionTitle, sg.likes_count AS likesCount, sg.report_count AS reportCount, sg.description AS description, sg.category AS category, sg.study_online AS studyOnline, sg.meeting_time AS meetingTime, sg.latitude AS latitude, sg.longitude AS longitude, sg.age AS age, sg.capacity AS capacity, sg.gender AS gender, sg.start_date AS startDate, sg.end_date AS endDate, sg.image AS image, sg.status AS status, sg.created_at AS createdAt, u.name AS leaderName FROM Studies sg JOIN Users u ON sg.study_leader_idx = u.user_idx WHERE sg.status = 'RECRUITING'

SELECT sg.study_idx AS studyIdx, sg.study_leader_idx AS studyLeaderIdx, sg.study_title AS studyTitle, sg.description_title AS descriptionTitle, sg.likes_count AS likesCount, sg.report_count AS reportCount, sg.description AS description, sg.category AS category, sg.study_online AS studyOnline, sg.meeting_time AS meetingTime, sg.latitude AS latitude, sg.longitude AS longitude, sg.age AS age, sg.capacity AS capacity, sg.gender AS gender, sg.start_date AS startDate, sg.end_date AS endDate, sg.image AS image, sg.status AS status, sg.created_at AS createdAt, u.name AS leaderName FROM Studies sg JOIN Users u ON sg.study_leader_idx = u.user_idx WHERE study_idx = #{studyIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StudyMembers (study_idx, user_idx, role, status, join_reason, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{studyIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{role}, #{status}, #{joinReason}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
